漹字的基本解释

漹
yān
古河名。a.在今中国山西省西部；b.为今中国湖北省宜城县蛮河。

漹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yān］
［《廣韻》有乾切，平仙，云。］
(1)古代水名。在今山西省西部。
(2)同“鄢”。古代水名。即今湖北省宜城县的蛮河，源出南漳县，流入汉水。

漹字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　漹； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页647第15
【唐韻】乙虔切【集韻】於虔切，?音焉。水名。【說文】水出西河中陽北沙。　又【集韻】於閑切，音黫。又尤虔切，音䗡。義?同。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?於建切，音堰。水名。在襄陽宜城。

漹字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
漹字的起名意思

暂无。

Chu
Basic explanation of words
Chu
yān
Furukawa name. a. In the western part of Shanxi Province, China; b. Manhe, Yicheng County, Hubei Province, China.
Chu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yān］
["Guangyun" has dry cut, flat fairy and cloud. ]
(1) Ancient water names. In the western part of Shanxi Province today.
(2) Same as "Yan". Ancient water name. That is, the Man River in Yicheng County, Hubei Province, originated from Nanzhang County and flows into Han River.
Chu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　漹; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 647 15
[Tang Yun] Yi Qianqie [Jiyun] Yu Qianqie,? Yin Yan. Water name. [Said the text] Water flows out of Xihe Zhongyang Beisha.　[Jiyun] Yu Xianqie, the sound is 黫. And especially pious, sound. Righteous? Same.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Yu Jianqie, Yinyan. Water name. In Xiangyang Yicheng.
